document_data.mainbody:
rezaail was an old male dragon who dwelled in the vicinity of Ironspur in the Galena Mountains circa 1351 DR.
In the , the adventuring mercenary named Skullcrusher, who originally hailed from the city of Phlan, tangled with Frezaails mate in a memorable event of which he reminisced in his twilight years. By the adventurers description, Frezaail was an infamous "old bastard."
